body.name: 70mai Dash Cam M300, 1296P QHD, Built in WiFi Smart Dash Camera for Cars, 140° Wide-Angle FOV, WDR, Night Vision, iOS/Android Mobile App
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 1 hr 41 mins
features: 【1296P QHD & 140° Wide-Angle FOV】Equipped with a 3-megapixel camera, the 70mai Dash Cam M300 records in 2304 x 1296P HD high resolution, featuring almost 1.5 times clearer than the standard 1080P dash cams. The 70mai Dash Cam M300 can easily capture license plates, road signs, and other critical details on the road. With 140° wide-angle FOV, this dash cam enables you to monitor more lanes with fewer blind spots

【3D Noise Reduction & WDR Technology】The 3D Noise Reduction algorithm removes unwanted pixels in the image and the WDR (Wide Dynamic Range) technology helps balance exposure level. Even in the low-light conditions, the 70mai Dash Cam M300 solidly provides you extremely clear and smooth image quality. No worries about losing important moments when driving in the tunnel, or under other undesirable lightings

【Parking Monitoring & Built-in G-Sensor】With a built-in G-sensor enabled, the dash cam can detect sudden shakes or collisions around the vehicle even when you are away. The dash cam solidly provides a 24-hour parking monitor by automatically started recording as well as capturing any potential incidents around your vehicle and will notify you through voice alert once it's turned back on (Kind Reminder: The 70mai Hardwire Kit is required for parking surveillance mode and is sold separately.)

【Time-lapse Recording】By compressing every 30 mins of footage into 1 min, your M300 enables long-term continuous recording at one frame per second while the car is parked. Hours-long surveillance video can be played back in minutes and catch crucial events quickly (Kind Reminder: The 70mai Hardwire Kit is required for time-lapse recording, and is sold separately.)

【Loop Recording & Evidence Protection】The dash cam automatically overwrites the oldest videos with the latest ones. The videos can be automatically saved and stored locally on a microSD memory card while driving, which ensures the video evidence will be captured and safely secured from overwriting. It supports high-endurance Class 10 (and above) microSD memory cards from 16GB up to 128GB (not included)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Enhanced road safety with clarity
reviews.reviewText: I recently installed the 70mai Smart Dash Cam in my car, and it has been an exceptional addition to my driving experience. Here's why I am recommending it:Superior Video Quality: The 1080P Full HD resolution is the standout feature of this dash cam. It delivers crisp, clear footage, ensuring that every detail of the road and surroundings is captured with precision. This high-quality recording is especially crucial in case of any road incidents, providing reliable evidence.Sony IMX307 Sensor: The inclusion of the Sony IMX307 sensor enhances the camera's performance, particularly in low-light conditions. Night drives are no longer a concern as this sensor ensures clarity and visibility, capturing vital details even in dimly lit environments.Smart Features: The 'smart' aspect of the 70mai Dash Cam 1S is truly impressive. Its ability to connect to smartphones for easy access and control of the footage adds a layer of convenience and user-friendliness. This feature is particularly handy for reviewing and saving important clips.Compact Design: I appreciate the compact and sleek design of this dash cam. It blends seamlessly with the car's interior without obstructing the view. Its unobtrusive presence ensures safety without being a distraction.Ease of Installation and Use: Setting up the 70mai 1S was straightforward. The instructions were clear, making the installation process hassle-free. Additionally, the user interface is intuitive, making it easy for anyone to operate.Value for Money: Considering the features and performance, this dash cam offers excellent value for money. It's an affordable investment for the level of security and peace of mind it provides while driving.In summary, the 70mai Smart Dash Cam 1S is a top-notch choice for anyone looking to enhance their vehicle's safety features. With its high-quality video, smart connectivity, and user-friendly design, it stands out as a reliable and worthwhile investment for drivers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect value for the money
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the 70mai Dash Cam and I must say, it has completely exceeded my expectations. The standout feature for me is undoubtedly the app connectivity, which I consider a game-changer in the realm of dash cams. Being able to seamlessly connect the camera to my phone and access footage instantly is not only convenient but adds an extra layer of security.The camera quality is impressive, providing clear and sharp recordings, which is crucial for any road incidents. The design is sleek and unobtrusive, blending in well with my car's interior. It was easy to install and set up, which is a big plus.However, I believe there's always room for improvement. An enhancement in night vision capabilities or wider angle coverage could make this product absolutely perfect. But as it stands, I'm really satisfied with my purchase. The 70mai Dash Cam offers great value for its price, and I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a reliable and advanced dash cam solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I had a 70mai dash cam last summer, but I can’t quite remember what I did with it. Decided to order a new one because not only is the price point good, but I’m fond of the video quality. I previously had a 1080p model and chose to go with the 1296p model this time around.Pros:• Sleek and not large - it doesn’t block your vision when driving• Comes with an electrostatic sticker instead of an awful suction cup, and so it sticks to the window better• Has a mobile app to adjust camera settings and review footage• Video and audio quality are goodCons:• Does not come with cable clips• Does not come with a trim tool to conceal the cord• USB adapter that comes in box only has one USB port• Does not come with Micro SD card• The mobile app can be challenging to navigate if you’re a new user• You have to be in wifi range of the camera powered on before you can review footage4/5 stars from me! If there was a way to review footage in a cloud instead of needing to be near the camera, I’d give it a 5.If you don’t already have a Micro SD card, you’ll need one. I believe this camera can accept one as high as 128gb. Totally recommend buying a car trim tool so you can conceal the cord. Recommend buying a USB adapter that has more than one USB port.

Embalagem bem feita o que denota originalidade do produto. Câmera com qualidade de construção muito boa, imagem bem nítida e o microfone capta bem o som interno do carro. O app tem que liberar a localização precisa caso contrario não conecta na câmera.

reviews.reviewTitle: Buena calidad de video, buen precio, práctica
reviews.reviewText: Graba buena calidad de video HD, es práctica para grabar o tomar fotos de emergencia con la voz, se conecta fácil con la app del celular. Quizás lo único a mejorar es como fijarla al auto. Yo no use las pegatinas, usé un chupón de plástico.

reviews.reviewTitle: Day and night image quality is very good.
reviews.reviewText: The product I use. I also bought a gift for my friend. Day and night image quality is very good. I advise.

Itana good camera. I wish it connected blue tooth and not wifi setting. Also for some reason every few days it says memory card error and I have re format it. Easy enough to do by pressing the on button 3 times, you don't even have to take thr card out but if there was something in the last 4 hours I would want to keep it would be lost. I thought maybe it was just the memory card but I have tried a few different ones. Same thing. The picture and video quality is really good. Very wide view aswell I can see about 10 feet each side of the hood of my vehicle. I would buy this again.
